creator: dbousseb@netcourrier.com
text:
Hello;

I use Apache 3.1.27 and Tomcat 4.1.16 + mod_jk on Solaris8. I would like to get 
a configuration works on this platform.
If you have a configuration which work, please send me the configuration files :
- httpd.conf
- server.xml
- workers.properties


Best regards;

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
This is not a bug. Please use tomcat-user for questions like this. The faq might
help too ...
http://tomcatfaq.sourceforge.net/
